choices.content: narrowing the electorate by high property qualifications

answer_3.response: Consider This: Hamilton had little respect for the Constitution, and ultimately formulated the doctrine of implied powers. The Republicans (Jeffersonians) advocated states’ rights, friendship with France, and vigilance against “the avaricious, monopolizing Spirit of Commerce and Commercial Men.” See L.O. 7.3 How did foreign affairs affect domestic politics during the 1790s?
